code: import axios from"axios";const api=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:5000",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const userStr=localStorage.getItem("currentUser");if(userStr){const user=JSON.parse(userStr);if(user.token)config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(user.token);}return config;});export default api;
